scripts.upgrade: yarn-upgrade-all && yarn remove framework7 framework7-vue extract-text-webpack-plugin && yarn add --dev extract-text-webpack-plugin@next && yarn add framework7@2.3.1 framework7-vue@2.3.0
scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp src/*.html build/ && cp src/*.png build/ && npx webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.dev.babel.js
scripts.release: rm -rf docs && mkdir docs && cp src/*.html docs/ && cp src/*.png docs/ && webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.prod.babel.js
